subject: Re: A bit confusing.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Thanks. Calling it an echo box has brought some negative comments, 
as skeptics think I'm adding sound effects to the signal. but using 
the box wiht channels seems to really enhance the voices, more than 
just using an empty box, or even no box. This latest sound box was 
made as I do everything else, just on a whim, the whole project being 
guided by intuition from day one. That's why I don't really feel like 
I actually know anything. 
 

 Frank-S
